options.content:
About dashboard and metrics exporter

For collecting MongoDB metrics [MongoDB exporter](https://github.com/percona/mongodb_exporter) is used. 
Dashboard was imported from [repository](https://github.com/percona/grafana-dashboards/tree/main/dashboards/MongoDB).

panels.description: Shows the uptime of MongoDB instance on VM
panels.title: MongoDB Uptime

panels.description: Shows statistics of operations with types "insert", "query", "update", "delete", "getmore"
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: This shows the role of the selected service. Normally this should be one of ``PRIMARY``, ``SECONDARY`` and ``ARBITER``, but if the system is newly added it could show ``STARTUP2`` during its initial sync.
panels.title: Current ReplSet State

panels.description: Ops or Replicated Ops/sec classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore). And (from the internal TTL threads) the docs deletes/sec by TTL indexes.

targets.expr:
avg by (instance) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$host", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$host", type!="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{instance=~"$host", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{instance=~"$host", type!="command"}[5m]))

avg by (instance) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$host", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$host", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$host", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$host", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m]))

panels.title: Command Operations

panels.description: Average latency of operations (classified by read, write, or (other) command)
panels.title: Latency Detail

targets.expr:
avg by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$host", state="current"} or
mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$host", state="current"} or
mongodb_connections{instance=~"$host", state="current"})

avg by (instance,state) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$host"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$host"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$host"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{instance=~"$host"})

panels.description: Docs per second inserted, updated, deleted or returned. (N.b. not 1-to-1 with operation counts.)
panels.title: Document Operations

panels.description: Operations queued due to a lock.
panels.title: Queued Operations

panels.description: Ratio of Documents returned or Index entries scanned / full documents scanned
panels.title: Query Efficiency

panels.description: This panel shows the number of objects (both data (scanned_objects) and index (scanned)) as well as the number of documents that were moved to a new location due to the size of the document growing. Moved documents only apply to the MMAPv1 storage engine.
panels.title: Scanned and Moved Objects

panels.description: Legacy driver operation: Number of, and Sum of time spent, per second executing getLastError commands to confirm write concern.
panels.title: getLastError Write Time

panels.description: Legacy driver operation: Number of getLastError commands that timed out trying to confirm write concern.
panels.title: getLastError Write Operations

panels.description: This panel shows the number of assert events per second on average over the given time period. In most cases assertions are trivial, but you would want to check your log files if this counter spikes or is consistently high.

targets.expr:
avg by (instance,type) (rate(mongodb_mongod_asserts_total{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_asserts_total{instance=~"$host"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_asserts_total{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_asserts_total{instance=~"$host"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_asserts_total{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_asserts_total{instance=~"$host"}[5m]))

panels.title: Assert Events

panels.description: Unix or Window memory page faults. Not necessarily from mongodb.

targets.expr:
avg by (instance) (rate(mongodb_mongod_extra_info_page_faults_total{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_extra_info_page_faults_total{instance=~"$host"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_extra_info_page_faults_total{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_extra_info_page_faults_total{instance=~"$host"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_extra_info_page_faults_total{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_extra_info_page_faults_total{instance=~"$host"}[5m]))

panels.title: Page Faults
